title: Crave Healthy Habits - Richmond-Adelaide Centre
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Health food cafe with a few outlets in the city. Offers to-go oatmeal and fruit breakfasts, soups, and lunch. Boxes are prepared to order so modifications can be made for vegans.
